```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(openxlsx)
library(gridExtra)
library(ggthemr)

```


```{r Fig1a}
data = read.csv('simu1_p.tsv', sep='\t')

sp = ggplot(data = data, aes(x=n,y=Values,color=Methods, group=Methods)) + geom_line(size=0.6,position = position_dodge(0.05)) + geom_point(position = position_dodge(0.05))+
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = Values - 1.96 * Confidence/10, ymax = Values + 1.96 * Confidence/10),width=0.1,position = position_dodge(0.05))

sp + facet_grid(Scenario ~ type) +xlab("Variable Number")+ylab("Scores")+
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#1c92d2","#f7b733", "#11998e","#6b6b83", "#f12711"))+
  theme(strip.text.x = element_text(size=12),
        strip.text.y = element_text(size=12),
        legend.position = 'bottom') + scale_x_log10()

ggthemr('fresh')
ggsave('Fig2a.eps')

```
